[vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”center center” css=”.vc_custom_1601387978814{padding-top: 200px !important;padding-bottom: 300px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Cyber-Awareness.jpg?id=11141) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_init_translate_x=”1″ ca_init_translate_y=”-53″ ca_delay=”300″ row_hide=”hidden-xs”][vc_column width=”1/2″ responsive_css=”padding_right_large:0px|padding_right_medium:50px|padding_right_small:80px”]

Cyber Essentials &
Cyber Essentials Plus

Would you like to assess your business’s cybersecurity and learn more about how to defend your systems from unskilled cyber attacks?

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ align=”text-center”] Get in touch [vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”right center” css=”.vc_custom_1597403820666{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 270px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Cyber-awareness-1.jpg?id=11142) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_init_translate_x=”1″ ca_init_translate_y=”-53″ ca_delay=”300″ row_hide=”hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg”][vc_column width=”1/2″]

Cyber Essentials
& Cyber Essentials
Plus

Would you like to assess your
business’s cybersecurity and
learn more about how to
defend your systems from
unskilled cyber attacks?

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ align=”text-center”] Get in touch [vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”0″ bg_position=”right top” css=”.vc_custom_1588849858825{background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/yellow-middle-section.jpg?id=8868) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Left” css=”.vc_custom_1597853084899{margin-top: -230px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}” ca_delay=”260″ ca_duration=”3000″ responsive_css=”margin_top_large:-230px|padding_top_large:60px|padding_right_large:50px|padding_bottom_large:60px|padding_left_large:50px|margin_top_medium:-230px|padding_top_medium:60px|padding_right_medium:30px|padding_bottom_medium:20px|padding_left_medium:30px|margin_top_small:-230px|padding_top_small:60px|padding_right_small:30px|padding_bottom_small:20px|padding_left_small:30px”]

Why us for your Cyber Essentials certification?

[vc_row_inner gap=”25″ css=”.vc_custom_1595431128178{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}” el_class=”square-icons” responsive_css=”padding_top_large:50px|padding_right_large:60px|padding_left_large:60px|padding_top_small:50px|padding_right_small:0px|padding_left_small:0px”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12″]

We have over 30 years' of experience in cyber security.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12″]

Our assessors are senior penetration testers and industry experts.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1600433029046{margin-right: -20px !important;margin-left: -20px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12″]

We help you build a strong foundation for your company’s cybersecurity.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]

We are an approved certified body for Cyber Essentials, working under the IASME consortium.

[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”center center” css=”.vc_custom_1600585434407{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/cyber-essentials-2.jpg?id=12548) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”31″ el_id=”detect-information-section”][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ align=”text-center” offset=”vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-xs” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”31″][/vc_column][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”0″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-md-offset-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ responsive_css=”margin_right_large:0px|margin_left_large:15%25|padding_left_large:7%25|margin_right_medium:0px|margin_left_medium:15%25|padding_right_medium:7%25|padding_left_medium:7%25|margin_right_small:0px” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”30″ css=”.vc_custom_1601635564061{margin-right: -10px !important;padding-top: 3% !important;padding-right: 3% !important;padding-bottom: 3% !important;padding-left: 3% !important;background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.82) !important;*background-color: rgb(255,255,255) !important;}”]

Discover your company’s cybersecurity weakness

[vc_column_text]Cyber Essentials is a Government-backed scheme that encourages organisations to adopt best practices in information security strategy. This, in turn, makes the UK a safer place to do business. In fact, this certification is fast becoming one of the requirements for companies in both B2B and B2C sales.

With our Cyber Essentials / Cyber Essentials Plus services, you get a cost-effective way to audit your internal IT security. Additionally, you also acquire a strong foundation from which to mitigate the risk from widespread, but unskilled, cyber attacks.[/vc_column_text]

Did you know you have 90 days after passing Cyber Essentials to apply for Cyber Essentials Plus? Would you like to book a pre-assessment?

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-xs”] Get in touch [/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ responsive_css=”margin_top_large:0px|margin_top_medium:0px|margin_top_small:0px” css=”.vc_custom_1600865211771{margin-top: 20px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-xs-12 vc_hidden-xs”][vc_single_image image=”12073″ img_size=”medium”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_col-xs-8″][vc_single_image image=”12073″ img_size=”medium”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ responsive_css=”margin_top_large:0px|margin_top_medium:0px|margin_top_small:0px” css=”.vc_custom_1600865218360{margin-top: 20px !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_col-xs-12″] Get in touch [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1596545179269{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;background-color: #122135 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_video link=”https://vimeo.com/475001949″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” bg_position=”center bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1600865264768{padding-top: 75px !important;padding-bottom: 75px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/slash-background-for-box-buttons-2.jpg?id=9304) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/3″ enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”0″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ align=”text-center” offset=”vc_col-sm-offset-2″ ca_init_translate_y=”50″][vc_empty_space height=”60px” el_class=”mobile-hidden”]

Why do you need Cyber Essentials?

[vc_empty_space height=”60px”][/vc_column][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ el_class=”ipad-full-width”]

Discover your cybersecurity weaknesses

Self-assess your organisation’s security against our assessor questionnaire annually, making your network and systems inherently more secure.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ responsive_css=”margin_top_large:30px|margin_top_medium:0px|margin_top_small:0px” el_class=”ipad-full-width”]

Implement common sense defence

Learn how to defend your organisation against widespread, but unskilled and untargeted, cyber attacks.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ el_class=”ipad-full-width”]

Be recognised for taking cybersecurity seriously

Proudly display your security awareness and show your customers, partners, and investors how seriously you take cybersecurity.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” bg_position=”center bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1600866752947{padding-top: 35px !important;padding-bottom: 35px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/mdr-grey-bg-yellow.jpg?id=11570) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” responsive_css=”padding_top_large:75px|padding_bottom_large:75px”][vc_column width=”1/6″ offset=”vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”5/6″ responsive_css=”margin_left_large:0px|margin_left_medium:30px|margin_left_small:30px” css=”.vc_custom_1600940207409{margin-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”60px”]

Build your own Cyber Essentials package

[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_row_inner el_class=”ipad-full-width”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1600940107573{margin-bottom: 30px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-color: #122135 !important;}” el_class=”ipad-full-width” responsive_css=”padding_top_large:30px|padding_right_large:30px|padding_bottom_large:30px|padding_left_large:30px” offset=”vc_col-md-5″][vc_column_text el_class=”o2c-blue-box”]

  • How long has it been since you audited your internal IT security policies?
  • How frequently is your endpoint security updated?
  • When was the last time your firewall configuration was updated?
  • How robust is your password policy?

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″ offset=”vc_col-md-7″ el_class=”ipad-full-width”][vc_column_text]Cyber Essentials is a simple and straightforward process which enables you to annually self-assess your organisation’s security against our assessor questionnaire, which is then verified by our accrediting body, IASME consortium.

Very quickly, this level of assessment will identify any issues and get you and your organisation thinking about cybersecurity.

Our assessors are all senior penetration testers with years of experience. With their help, you can build a strong foundation to defend your organisation against everyday cyber attacks.

You can also build your own package by selecting the services you want and paying just for those.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”30px” el_class=”mobile-hidden”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1601565738933{margin-top: 30px !important;}” el_id=”get-quote”][vc_column]

  • Cyber Essentials
  • Cyber Essentials Plus

[vc_column_text]

Cyber Essentials requirements

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1601565962783{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”]Simply fill in the form to receive a quote based on your chosen services.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner]

1
2
3
4
5

  • Cyber Essentials certification includes defining the scope, completing the questionnaire, and an external verification from the accrediting body. To help you, we provide certain services. You can choose which ones you want to build your own bespoke package.

    What you get

    • Access to an intelligent online portal that provides guidance at all stages, as well as identifying any potential snag points prior to submission of your final questionnaire.

    • Certification by an accredited assessor with detailed feedback on responses

    • Comprehensive assessment report

    • Free Cyber Insurance up to £25,000 *

      • *Company needs to have turnover of less than £20 Million, HQ domiciled in UK and have whole company in scope of certification.

  • Option 1: Video Tutorial

    Select the tick box to include this feature in your Cyber Essentials package

  • portal video

    Don’t have an internal IT Team?
    Get additional help with a video walk-through of the Cyber Essentials portal. Our video will explain each question within the assessment and guide you through the answers expected for each section.

  • Option 2: Consultation

    Select the tick box to include this feature in your Cyber Essentials package

  • portal video

    Do you need remote or onsite consultation?
    Book a half-day consultation that can be taken all in one go or over the period of the certification. Remote or onsite.

  • Option 3: Pre-assessment

    Did you know you have 90 days after passing Cyber Essentials to apply for Cyber Essentials Plus? Select the tick box to include this feature in your Cyber Essentials package

  • portal video

    Do you need to apply for Cyber Essentials Plus?
    Start now with a Cyber Essentials Plus pre-assessment providing you results ahead of the test, increasing your chances of passing first time.

    • Final Steps

      Please fill in the following fields to complete the form

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1597317205901{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

Cyber Essentials Plus requirements

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]To certify for Cyber Essentials Plus, you must have gained the cyber essentials certification within the last 90 days.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1601566041004{margin-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner]

1
2
3
4

  • In addition to what’s included in Cyber Essentials, Plus also offers external and internal vulnerability assessments, malware exposure assessment, workstation build assessment and mobile device assessment.

    What you get

    • Certification by an accredited assessor with detailed feedback on responses
    • On-site or remote audit, assessing in-scope:
      1. Workstations / Servers
      2. Anti-Malware / Anti-Virus defences
      3. Mobile devices (phones/tablets)
    • External vulnerability assessment
    • Report
    • Free Cyber Insurance up to £25,000 *
    *Company needs to have turnover of less than £20 Million, HQ domiciled in UK and have whole company in scope of certification.

  • Option 1: Consultation

    Select the tick box to include this feature in your Cyber Essentials package

  • portal video

    Do you need remote or onsite consultation?
    Book a half-day consultation that can be taken all in one go or over the period of the certification. Remote or onsite. Final testing is then conducted by a different assessor and includes a selection of practice tests.

  • Option 2: Pre-assessment

    Did you know you have 90 days after passing Cyber Essentials to apply for Cyber Essentials Plus? Select the tick box to include this feature in your Cyber Essentials package

  • portal video

    Want to increase your chances of passing first time?
    Would you like to know if your environment is secure enough to pass the Cyber Essentials Plus assessment prior to the audit? Add the Cyber Essentials Plus pre-assessment and GAP analysis to find out.

    • Final Steps

      Please fill in the following fields to complete the form

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

"I need a trusted partner that can provide additional security services into my portfolio."

Managing Director

Enhance your portfolio with our suite of cybersecurity services Find out more

“As a security manager I know the benefit of carrying out simulated cyber attacks on our systems. I need a service provider that can handle my requirements.”

Security Manager

Uncover critical vulnerabilities in your environment Find out more

“I need a supplier that understands the importance of implementing and maintaining Information Security best practices critical to our ongoing success and reputation.”

Managing Director

Get real-time ongoing cyber detection & response Find out more

“My job is to ensure that our business is protected against cyber security attacks. I need a company that can hunt for and eradicate threats.”

CISO

24/7 ongoing monitoring to hunt for and eradicate threats Find out more

“I need a company that can deliver cutting-edge training to my staff, ensuring they are empowered to recognise and defend against cyber security threats.”

Head of Training

Training and advisory services to empower your staff Find out more
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row parallax=”enable_parallax” enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Right” enable_overlay=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1601387993009{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 140px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Testimonials-V2.jpg?id=12953) !important;background-position: center;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ el_id=”testimonials-pen-test” row_hide=”hidden-xs”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-4″]

Testimonials

[/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-offset-3 vc_col-md-9″]

“I have been very impressed by the high standard of Falanx’s communication, testing procedures and reporting. From the initial engagement through to test reports and follow up advice, they have provided exceptional service and I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend them; we will certainly be using them again for future testing.”

Claudia Zimmer
Operations Manager, Ensign Pensions

“The team at Falanx have been great, from an initial enquiry to completing the test has been seamless. Our account manager and the rest of the team have been incredibly reactive in responding to our queries and the work performed has been great. I would not hesitate to recommend Falanx for your IT Security needs.”

Mitchell Smith
Product Manager, One Site Global Ltd

“We have worked with Falanx Cyber for several years and have always been impressed with the professional service they provide. This begins with the early stages of planning, providing useful advice on which areas to focus testing on, including any specific details around emerging threats. This continues with the execution of the agreed pen tests and vulnerability assessments where we are kept informed throughout the whole process, and finally with the informative reports produced and any assistance required following any remediation efforts.”

James Myhill
Head of IT, Canal and River Trust

“Falanx provided us with a phishing campaign that delivered a invaluable insight into how our staff reacted to potentially dangerous phishing attempts. The Phishing results were very  enlightening and will help shape our internal cyber security awareness program. We were very pleased with the design and execution of the campaign and we will continue to use Falanx for further phishing campaigns to prove the effectiveness of our cyber security training”

Tony Donn
Head of IT, Cenkos

“Falanx conducted in-person training session that made employees engage, participate, and ask questions. Rob the trainer showed us that human recognition is one of the most important lines of defence against phishing and cyber security attacks. We especially enjoyed Rob’s stories of social engineering and made all employees sit up and think how important all aspects of cyber security not just attacks via conventional means.”

Tony Donn
Head of IT, Cenkos

“We see great value in investing in positive reinforcement of staff, especially in delivering awareness training. Due to COVID-19 on site training was not possible but Falanx were able to step in and provide their usual high quality cyber security training over web.”

Cyber Security Manager
Leading Specialist Bank
[/vc_column][/vc_row]

yoast_head_json.description: Cyber Essentials & Cyber Essentials Plus provide you with a cost-effective way to audit your internal IT security. Learn why Falanx Cyber is the right choice for this certification.
yoast_head_json.og_title: Cyber Essentials & Cyber Essentials Plus Certification | Falanx Cyber
yoast_head_json.og_description: Cyber Essentials & Cyber Essentials Plus provide you with a cost-effective way to audit your internal IT security. Learn why Falanx Cyber is the right choice for this certification.
